| tstats count WHERE index=$index$ by _time host sourcetype index span=15m | sort 0 - host sourcetype index _time | streamstats window=2 range(_time) as range by host sourcetype index | sort - host | search range > 900 | stats avg(range) as avg max(range) as max by sourcetype host index | eval max=round(max/60,0) | eval avg=round(avg/60,0) | rename max as "Maximum Gap" avg as "Average Gap"

| tstats count WHERE index=$index$ by _time host sourcetype index span=15m | sort 0 - host sourcetype index _time | streamstats window=2 range(_time) as range by host sourcetype index | eval HourOfDay=strftime(_time, "%H") | eval DayOfWeek=strftime(_time, "%A") | eval weekend=case(LIKE(DayOfWeek,"Saturday"), "weekend", LIKE(DayOfWeek,"Sunday"), "weekend", 1=1, "weekday") | eval business_hour=case(HourOfDay>8 AND HourOfDay<17 AND weekend!="weekend", "businesshour", 1=1, "nonbusinesshour") | fields business_hour weekend sourcetype index host count
|eventcount summarize=false index=* -count | table index | dedup index

| tstats count WHERE index=$index$ by _time host sourcetype index span=15m | eval combo=host."-".sourcetype."-".index | xyseries _time combo count | makecontinuous _time span=15m | fillnull value=0

panel.title: Specific Gap Broken Down by Host/Index/Sourcetype

search.query: | tstats count WHERE index=$index$ by _time host sourcetype index span=15m | sort 0 - host sourcetype index _time | streamstats window=2 range(_time) as range by host sourcetype index | eval combo=host."-".sourcetype."-".index | stats avg(range) as avg max(range) as max count(combo) as M by sourcetype host index| eval max=round(max,0) | eval avg=round(avg,0) | addinfo | eval N=ceiling((info_max_time-info_min_time)/15/60) | eval frequency=M/N | fields index sourcetype host frequency avg max| eval frequency=round(frequency*100,0)."%"

panel.title: Percent Difference (Business Hour vs Non-Business Hour)

search.query: | eval combo=host."-".sourcetype."-".index | stats avg(count) as avg by business_hour,combo | xyseries combo business_hour avg | eval perc_diff=abs(((businesshour-nonbusinesshour)/((businesshour+nonbusinesshour)/2))*100) | fillnull value=0 perc_diff | eventstats p95(frequency) as p95 p75(frequency) as p75 p50(frequency) as p50 p25(frequency) as p25 | eval Percentile = case(frequency >= p95, "95",frequency >= p75, "75",frequency >= p50, "50", frequency >= p25, "25", 1=1, "0") | fields perc_diff combo | eval perc_diff=round(perc_diff,0)."%"|rename perc_diff as "Percent Difference" combo as "host-sourcetype-index"

| eval combo=host."-".sourcetype."-".index | stats avg(count) as avg by weekend,combo | xyseries combo weekend avg | eval perc_diff=abs(((weekday-weekend)/((weekday+weekend)/2))*100) | fillnull value=0 perc_diff | eventstats p95(perc_diff) as p95 p80(perc_diff) as p80 p50(perc_diff) as p50 | eval Percentile = case(frequency >= p95, "95",frequency >= p75, "75",frequency >= p50, "50", frequency >= p25, "25", 1=1, "0") | fields perc_diff combo | eval perc_diff=round(perc_diff,0)."%"|rename perc_diff as "Percent Difference" combo as "host-sourcetype-index"
